extension.description: Displays Notifications of pending actions for the moderator and connections functionality of Community Builder.

field.name: pretext
field.label: Pre-text
field.description: Input substitution supported html to display at the top of the module.

field.name: posttext
field.label: Post-text
field.description: Input substitution supported html to display at the bottom of the module.

field.name: show_banned
field.label: Profile Banned Notification
field.description: Show or hide display of profile banned notification if banned.

field.name: show_image_approval
field.label: Image Approval Notification
field.description: Show or hide display of moderator user image approval notifications. Note this notification only displays to CB moderators.

field.name: show_user_reports
field.label: User Reports Notification
field.description: Show or hide display of moderator user profile report notifications. Note this notification only displays to CB moderators.

field.name: show_uban_requests
field.label: Profile Unban Notification
field.description: Show or hide display of moderator user profile unban request notifications. Note this notification only displays to CB moderators.

field.name: show_user_approval
field.label: User Approval Notification
field.description: Show or hide display of moderator user registration approval notifications. Note this notification only displays to CB moderators.

field.name: show_pms
field.label: Private Message Notifications
field.description: Show or hide display of private message notifications link.

field.name: show_connections
field.label: Connection Request Notifications
field.description: Show or hide display of connection request notifications link.

field.name: cb_plugins
field.label: CB Plugins integration
field.description: Choose if you want to use CB events for CB plugins integration. Plugins must be installed and configured in CB plugins management. Warning: this loads CB plugins on each page where this module is displayed, consuming memory and processing power.
